name: Versa Crutch Pack
description: Roomy main zippered compartment large enough for personal items.
extended_description:
The Versa Crutch Pack attaches to either forearm crutches or standard-type crutches with Velcro-like hook and loop closures. The Crutch Pack has a roomy main zippered compartment large enough for a wallet, checkbook, comb/brush, medicine, etc. -- even an occasional sandwich.

It may also be attached to the side of some power chairs (hangs toward the front of the armrest, partially on the armrest and partially on the metal tubing by the knee) and to the tiller of some scooters (ones that have tubing on which to attach the pack).

Stabilizer straps on back of the Versa Crutch Pack prevents swinging.

Made of durable, weather resistant nylon packcloth.

Versa Crutch Pack Specifications:

Size: 6" x 9" x 2.5"

name: Walker Grip Wraps
description: Extra thick fleece covered walker hand grip covers.
extended_description:
The Walker Grip Wraps are great covers for walker hand grips! Put these on, use them for awhile, and you'll wonder how you ever did without!

Soft, thick, sheepskin-like fleece, wraps around the walker hand grips, providing cushioning protection for hands; especially important for sensitive skin. Note: The fleece is made extra thick and plush -- you'll notice the difference right away.

The Walker Grip Wraps also have a special cotton lining with "Grip Dots" that help provide a sure grip by preventing the wraps from sliding.

May be machine washed and dried.

Made of 93% Polyester, 7% Acrylic Sheepskin-like Fleece, exclusive of trim; lining 100% cotton with Grip Dots

Walker Grip Wraps Specifications:

Size: 6.5" x 6.5"
Sold as: a pair.

name: Wheelchair Armrest Wraps
description: Soft, thick sheepskin like fleece that wraps around the wheelchair armrests.
extended_description:
The Wheelchair Armrest Wraps are soft, thick sheepskin like fleece that wrap around the wheelchair armrests to provide cushioning and protection. These armrest covers are especially important for people with sensitive skin. You can easily attach the armrest wraps to the wheelchair armrests using Velcro-like hook and loop closures.

The armrest wrap fleece is made extra thick and plush to our specifications -- we think you'll really like it!

Please note: These armrest wraps fits standard width wheelchair armrests, and does not fit the extra wide platform type.

Made of 93% Polyester, 7% Acrylic. May be machine washed and dried. Available in two sizes: for full length (12 to 15 inches) or desk size (8 to 11 inches) armrests.

Wheelchair Armrest Wraps Specifications:

Full length: 12 to 15 inch armrests
Desk size: 8 to 11 inch armrests

name: SideKick Wheelchair Pouch
description: Attaches to the wheelchair armrest or beneath the seat.
extended_description:
The SideKick Wheelchair Pouch can be attached to the wheelchair armrest or beneath the seat. Its main zippered compartment holds wallets, brushes and other small personal items.

Main zippered pocket holds wallet, brush/comb, etc. Ring type zipper pull is particularly helpful for those with limited hand dexterity.

Fleece lined pocket is ideal for eyeglasses, sunglasses or other small items.

Front bellowed pocket keeps other necessities close at hand.

The SideKick Wheelchair Pouch is designed to hang on the inside of manual wheelchair armrests or beneath the seat or it may be hung on the outside of most power chair armrests. Easily and securely attaches using Velcro-like hook and loop. (Note: if you're planning on hanging it to the inside of the armrest, keep in mind that you need a little room. If you're thinking of the SideKick for your scooter, the scooter has to have the metal bar-type handles.)

Made of durable, weather resistant packcloth and fleece.

SideKick Wheelchair Pouch Specifications:

Pouch Size: 12.25" X 7"

name: Privacy Cover :: Catheter Bag Cover
description: Attaches securely to back of wheelchair or onto bed rail using Velcro-like hook and loop closures to discreetly conceal a catheter bag.
extended_description:
The Privacy Cover attaches securely to back of wheelchair or onto bed rail using Velcro-like hook and loop closures to discreetly conceal a catheter bag.

Urinary drainage bag hangs inside the Privacy Cover on a polycarbonate support bar; Velcro-like hook and loop strap (inside the Privacy Cover) stabilizes the UD bag.

Front modesty panel may be kept open for monitoring urinary output or closed for privacy.

Extended zippered opening (around sides and bottom) allows the front of the Privacy Cover to be folded up and out of the way when emptying the UD bag; the Privacy Cover does not have to be removed to drain the UD bag.

Note: It's a good idea to remove the polycarbonate support bar before laundering.

Due to hygiene purposes, this item is non-returnable.

Privacy Cover :: Catheter Bag Cover Specifications:

Size: 12.5 x 15.5 x .75 inches.
Material: durable, weather resistant pack-cloth.
Color: Blue or Black

name: Jazz Wheelchair Backpack
categories: Wheelchair Accessories/Wheelchair Packs, Bags & Totes@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Large capacity wheelchair backpack has a place for just about everything.
extended_description:
The Jazz Backpack has a foam-lined back and semi-rigid top that helps hold its shape and structure, making the zippers easier to open and close. It is designed to hang on the back of wheelchairs using web straps that easily adjust to fit most wheelchair seat backs. (Use upper buckle placement for manual wheelchairs; criss cross straps at top and use lower buckles for scooters and power chairs with scooter-type upholstered seat backs.)

Front pocket is divided into two roomy compartments - sized to easily hold sport type water bottles. (You can actually get two 1-liter water bottles in each compartment!) Additional front pocket holds small items and has a reflective strip to help ensure visibility. Ring-type zipper pulls are particularly helpful for those with limited hand dexterity.

Small web loops at the back, bottom corners may be used to secure the Jazz Backpack to your chair if desired. Also has Velcro-like hook and loop strap at center back that may be used to secure the backpack to the bar of a sport type wheelchair.

Jazz Wheelchair Backpack Specifications:

Main Compartment: 13.75 x 13.25 x 5.25 inches.
Front Pocket: 13.75 x 10.5 x 3.5 inches (has center divider).
Material: durable, weather resistant pack-cloth.

name: AbleTripod® Walking Cane Base
description: Makes your walking cane self-standing, provides maximum stability and function to your cane.
extended_description:
The ergonomically designed AbleTripod® Base weighs 8½ ounces and makes your walking cane self-standing, providing maximum stability and function to your cane. Composed of a durable, specially weighted rubber compound, great care was taken to control the right amount of flexibility, giving the base its remarkable performance.

Stairs are now easily managed. Quad canes need to be turned sideways on stairs, making the user uncomfortable and in some cases fearful. The AbleTripod® gives the user confidence to negotiate even the narrowest steps.

The stress of impact on the user's hand is greatly reduced by the AbleTripod® Base, which flexes as you walk. The tips of the pods flex, grabbing while permitting the AbleTripod® to roll through, maintaining contact with the ground. The stability of the AbleTripod® base is not compromised whether on grass, gravel or sand , whereas typical canes may sink into the ground.

The AbleTripod® Walking Cane Tip can be used in ways that no other cane can: its unique design enables the user to lean into the cane, experiencing both support and balance. The ability to lateralize gives the user a unique feeling of confidence, knowing that the AbleTripod® is less likely to slip out than quad canes.

The patented AbleTripod® Base easily replaces your walking cane tip, addressing all of these issues and more.

The base comes in 4 standard-size openings: 5/8", 3/4", 7/8", 1" and 11/16"

**See Diagram above for proper fit.**

AbleTripod® Walking Cane Base Specifications:

4 standard-size openings: 5/8", 3/4", 7/8", 1" and 11/16"
Weight 8 1/2 ounces

name: Pathlighter - Discontinued
description: The lighted safety cane provides an extra degree of mobility, security and comfort.
extended_description:
The patented Pathlighter™ cane shines light at your feet so you can walk with greater assurance and safety.

The revolutionary Path Lighter cane not only provides the exceptional support of traditional orthopedic offset style canes, it offers the added safety of a light built right into the shaft to help see what surrounds you. It provides additional safety in the dark for the vision impaired as well as peace of mind for their loved ones..

Whether going up or down stairs, getting into the car, or finding your way in dimly lit areas, the Path Lighter lighted safety cane provides an extra degree of mobility, security and comfort. And because the light switch is on the end of the handle, it's easy to turn on with a simple push of a button..

The powerful Xenon lamp provides exceptional brightness which allows you to walk better, see better, and feel better..

The Pathlighter™ lighted safety cane is the perfect gift for anyone with impaired vision that could benefit from a lighted mobility aid. They'll have extra support and feel secure while walking in the dark. **This product is no longer available.

name: Penco Walker Glides
categories: Walker Accessories/Walker Balls, Slides & Glides@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Helps you glide your walker across most floor surfaces.
extended_description:
The ski design of the Penco Walker Glides allows for easy movement over thresholds and slight elevation changes without snagging or the need to lift the walker. Penco Walker Glides are designed to fit front-wheeled walkers with 1 inch to 1 1/8 inch tubing diameter. Penco Walker Glides feature a patented, self-fitting mechanism for easy installation. Made of durable, high density resin for use on all walking surfaces. The self-fitting mechanism and stainless steel tightening bolt keep the glides safe and secure. Manufactured in the United States.

Penco Walker Glides Specifications:

Fits: front-wheeled walkers with 1 inch to 1 1/8 inch tubing diameter.
Construction: durable, plastic material.

name: Adjustable Folding Designer Canes
description: Decorative aluminum adjustable folding canes.
extended_description:
Decorative aluminum Adjustable Folding Fancy Canes feature attractive designer patterns and colors. These fun and fashionable folding canes are perfect for both men and women. When folded, they fit conveniently and compactly in a pocketbook or carrying case. Constructed of strong, yet lightweight anodized 3/4 inch aluminum tubing with slip-resistant rubber tip. Height easily adjusts from 33 to 37 inches in 1 inch increments. Polished contour wood derby-top style handle for a secure grip. Slip resistant rubber tip for safety. Four sections extend automatically when removed from pocketbook or purse to provide a convenient support cane. Safely supports up to 250 pound weight capacity.

Choose from Beige Floral, Green Ice, Green Cyclone, Blue Ice and Blue Cyclone.

Adjustable Folding Designer Canes Specifications:

Construction: strong, lightweight anodized 3/4 inch aluminum tubing.
Height: adjusts from 33 to 37 inches in 1 inch increments.
Weight capacity: 250 pounds.

name: Offset Swing Clear Door Hinges
description: For doorways that are too narrow to fit a wheelchair through.
extended_description:
Do you have trouble maneuvering through your doorway?

This easy to install Offset Door Hinge adds an additional 2 inches to any doorway. Offset Door Hinges are also known as Swing Clear Hinges as they will actually swing your door clear of the door frame making it easier to get a wheelchair or walker through the doorway.

Rather than cutting a larger frame and installing a bigger door, Offset Hinges are cost effective and can be retro-fitted to handle most residential doors. These expandable Z shaped door hinges use the same screws and holes as the existing hinge.

For residential doors only.

Offset Swing Clear Door Hinges Specifications:

Measures: 3 ½ in H x 2 in W.
Weighs: 1.8 lbs per pair
Hinges per package: 2

description: For people who require either walking or resting assistance.
extended_description:
The Handy Seat Walking Cane was designed for people who require either walking or resting assistance. Perfect for individuals who suffer from arthritis, hip or leg surgery, fibromyalgia, back injury or any other physical disability that makes walking for an extended period difficult.

Having the Handy Seat cane available allows you to rest when needed or can be used as a walking cane. Lightweight aluminum has a cushioned grip handle, vinyl 7 1/2" square seat, 3 rubber-tipped legs. Weighs only 28 ounces, supports up to 250 pounds! Folds to 25" high.

Perfect for everyday walking or sitting!

Suitable for people 5'2" (157 cm) to 6'2" (188 cm) tall.

Weight: 28 ounces.

Cane Length: 34" tall.
Seat Height: 21" tall.

**This item is currently not available.** Flip the switch and you will have the freedom and security to move about in the dark. The Life Light Walker Light attaches to any style walker. Three bright white LED lights show the way in this wheelchair and walker light. name: 5 Cleat Ice Pick for Canes and Crutches
description: Prevents a cane or crutch from slipping on snow-covered, slushy or icy surfaces.
extended_description:
This plated steel Cane, Walker and Crutch Ice Pick attachment has five points to prevent a cane or crutch from slipping on snow-covered, slushy or icy surfaces. It clamps onto canes from 5/8" to 1" in diameter with the screws provided.

Simply squeeze the two plastic knobs together to swing the point into place and lock into position for use. When not needed, flip the point up in the retracted position to expose the rubber tip of the cane for normal use. A screwdriver is required for installation.

Package: One per package.

name: No Wire Walker Basket
description: Built-in glass, can or cup holder, a smaller compartment for coins or medications and a trough for utensils.
extended_description:
Firmly attaches to the horizontal and vertical bars of the walker. Flexible, virtually indestructible, retractable stabilizing arms lock onto the legs of the walker and eliminate excess swinging.

The front of the No Wire Walker Basket features a slot for an identification tag and the bottom of the basket has a built-in glass, can or cup holder, a smaller compartment for coins or medications and a trough for utensils, pens, straws or eyeglasses. No additional tray is needed. Can be attached on the inside or outside of the walker.

Ships and stores flat. Easy to assemble. Made of polypropylene. Dimensions: unassembled - 16 1/4 x 7 11/16 x 2 1/8 inches, assembled - 16 1/4 x 8 3/4 x 8 1/4 inches.

name: Star Glide Walker Slides
categories: Walker Accessories/Walker Balls, Slides & Glides@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Allow for easier movement of the walker.
extended_description:
Star Glide Walker Slides are walker glide tips designed for use by individuals with walking and balance disabilities. These nylon glides replace the rubber tips on the rear legs of wheeled walkers to reduce friction and allow the walker to move easier. Simple to use and easy to install. Just remove the rubber tips from the walker legs and replace them with Star Glides™. These walker slides are long lasting and are sold in a package of 2. Two sizes are available to choose from: 1 inch diameter and 1 1/8 diameter.

Star Glide Walker Slides Specifications

  • Constructed of durable nylon material.
  • Bright blue color.
  • Package of 2.
  • Reduces friction to allow wheeled walkers to move easily.
  • Available in two sizes for 1 inch and 1 1/8 inch diameter walker tubing.

name: Clip Cane Holder
description: Simply snap one side of the clip onto any tubular structure.
extended_description:
The Clip Cane Holder is a cane holder with double clips that holds your cane and clips to round tubing. This cane holder allows users to keep a cane handy wherever they may need it. Simply snap one side of this cane holder onto a round tubular structure such as a table leg, walker, commode frame, wheelchair, or lawn chair. The opposite side of the clip will hold most diameters of canes. The gripping surfaces are soft plastic rollers and will not damage the cane shaft. The Clip Cane Holder measures 3 inches long, 2 inches wide, 1 3/4 inches high.

Clip Cane Holder Specifications:

  • Double clips hold your cane and attaches to round tubing.
  • Clips have soft plastic rollers that will not scratch cane shaft.
  • Measures 3 x 2 x 1 3/4 inches.

categories: Web Specials/Discontinued Items@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Allows a cane to be attached to any metal surface.
extended_description:
The Magnetic Cane Holder has a Powerful magnet that allows a cane to be attached to any metal surface. For crutches, two sets are needed.

Each kit includes one magnetic cane attachment, a metal fastening plate and a strip of double-sided tape. Stainless steel fastening plate can be attached to any non-metal surface - walls, doors, furniture - in frequently used areas, allowing for a convenient cane rest just about anywhere. The Magnetic Cane Holder fastening plate has holes for permanent mounting (screws/nails not included) or can be attached using the double-sided tape.

Magnetic Cane Holder Specifications:

Magnetic Cane Holder kit includes: one magnetic cane attachment, a metal fastening plate and a strip of double-sided tape.

name: Wheelchair Brake Lever Extension
description: Wheelchair brake lever extensions provide increased leverage.
extended_description:
Wheelchair Brake Lever Extensions provide increased leverage to make it easier to lock the brakes of wheelchair wheels. These wheelchair brake extenders slip onto the existing brake lever of the wheel chair. Wheelchair brake extensions are made of steel with a black rubber tip and are sold as a pair. These brake extensions are designed to fit Invacare, Medline, Evermed wheelchairs and most other brands and are sold as a pair. Brake extensions enable wheelchair users with one hand or limited mobility to successfully lock both wheelchair brakes. This helps reduce falls from unlocked wheelchairs.

Wheelchair Brake Lever Extensions Specifications:

  • Choose from 6 inch or 8 inch lengths.
  • Made of steel with black rubber tip.
  • Designed to fit Invacare wheelchairs and most others.
  • Sold as a pair.

name: Accu-Grips™ :: Wheelchair Grips
description: Replace the existing wheelchair leg rest and wheel lock grips.
extended_description:
The Accu-Grips are much-needed, state-of-the art wheelchair grips that replace the existing leg rest and wheel lock grips on manual wheelchairs. The unique design and bright yellow color enable wheelchair users and their caregivers to more readily locate the grips.

Products like Accu-Grips™ do not currently exist on the market. Because the product developer worked directly with wheelchair users throughout her career as a health care provider, she noticed that the majority of her patients had difficulty seeing or feeling the original grips on their wheelchairs. Her committment to her patients and her willingness to solve this challenge led to the development of Accu-Grips™.

Accu-Grip Instructions

Accu-Grips™ :: Wheelchair Grips Specifications:

Material: ABS plastic.
4-piece set: 2 Grips for the Wheel Locks and 2 Grips for the Leg Rests.

name: INGRID Cane Holder :: Walking Cane Holder
description: Hang your walking cane or crutch on chairs, shopping carts, tables, counter tops, etc.
extended_description:
The INGRID Cane Holder was developed in 1998 following consultation with Swedish experts in design and steel manufacturing, resulting in a unique combination of elegance and function.

The walking cane holder is made of high quality thermoplastic rubber (Santoprene) and has a stainless steel spring specifically designed for the Cane Holder. It has a simple snap-on fitting and may be attached by users with reduced muscular strength.

Thanks to having both a hook and a prop, the holder lets you hang your walking cane or crutch on chairs, shopping carts, tables, counter tops, etc.

INGRID Cane Holder :: Walking Cane Holder Specifications:

Fits cane sizes: 19-25 mm (3/4"-1").

name: Ingrid Classic Cane/Crutch Tip - Medium
description: Provides for an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors.
extended_description:
The Ingrid Classic Cane/Crutch Tip is manufactured in Sweden and made of high quality polyurethane. The use of this material makes them extremely durable and provides for an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors.

Safety is enhanced because the tread pattern at the bottom of the tip does not wear as quickly as a conventional tip. Inside the tip is a rust proof metal washer made of zinc plated steel which prevents the cane or crutch from wearing through the tip. The "tire track" treads at the point of contact provide an excellent grip on most surfaces.

The convex bottom enhances both walking comfort and durability. This cane tip has a patented elastic neck which adjusts to the dimension of the cane or crutch shaft, making it easy for the user to replace tips as needed.

Ingrid Classic Cane/Crutch Tip - Medium Specifications:

Material: high quality polyurethane.
Fits: canes and crutches with common dimensions of 5/8" - 7/8" (16 - 22mm).
Color: black.
Packaging: one tip per package.

name: INGRID Cane or Crutch Tip with Retractable Spike - Medium
description: Retractable Spike provides a firm grip on snow, ice and most other outdoor surfaces.
extended_description:
The Ingrid Cane or Crutch Tip with Retractable Spike provides a firm grip on snow, ice and most other outdoor surfaces. Spike easily retracts for use during summer months or while indoors. Retracted spike will not damage floors.

Designed and manufactured in Sweden, the cane or crutch tip is made of high quality polyurethane and provides an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors. The retractable spike is made of stainless steel and will not rust.

The tread pattern at the bottom of the tip does not wear as quickly as a conventional can or crutch tips. Inside the tip is a rust proof zink-plated washer that prevents the cane or crutch from wearing through the tip.

The tip has a patented elastic neck that adjusts to the dimension of the cane or crutch shaft making it easy for the user to replace or substitute tips as needed.

INGRID Cane or Crutch Tip with Retractable Spike - Medium Specifications:

Fits: cane or crutch shafts measuring 5/8" - 7/8" (16 - 22mm).
Color: black
Package: one tip per package.

name: Crutch Mate Gel Arm Pads
categories: Crutch Accessories@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Glycerin gel provides unmatched arm padding for crutches.
extended_description:
Glycerin gel provides unmatched arm padding for crutches. Crutch Gel Arm padding is designed to reduce the crutches friction and help prevent the incidence of skin breakdown. Especially useful for individuals who utilize crutches for longer periods.

Crutch gel arm pads provide long lasting comfort. Crutch gel arm pads attach easily to crutches with hook-and-loop closures. They can be wiped down with a damp cloth and mild soap or disinfectant. Crutch Mate Gel Arm Pads are sold in pairs.

To install the Crutch Mate Gel Arm Pads, simply remove the old arm pad from the crutch core, stretch Crutch-Mate™ over the core and press hook & loop closure in place.

Crutch Mate Gel Arm Pads Specifications:

Gel Thickness: 3/8 inch.

name: Crutch Mate Gel Hand Pads
categories: Crutch Accessories@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Especially useful for individuals who utilize crutches for longer periods.
extended_description:
The Gel Crutch Mate Hand Pads are made from glycerin gel. Designed to reduce the friction and help prevent the incidence of skin breakdown. Especially useful for individuals who utilize crutches for longer periods. Made of a resilient gel formula that retains its shape and effectiveness over time. Gel Crutch Mate Hand Pads provide long lasting comfort. They can be wiped down with a damp cloth and mild soap or disinfectant.

The hand grips are completely round and slide on. To install, simply remove the old hand grip core from the crutch, and slip off the original foam pad. Next, push the core through the Crutch-Mate™ Hand Grip Crutch Pad and re-assemble the crutch. Latex free hand grip pads are a great alternative for latex sensitive users. One pair of Crutch Mate Gel Hand Pads per package.

Fits both auxiliary crutches and forearm crutches.

Crutch Mate Gel Hand Pads Specifications:

Gel Thickness: 3/8"

name: Security Pole & Grab Bar
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Pivoting Curve Grab Bar can be positioned where it is most needed.
extended_description:
Tension mounted, floor to ceiling Security Pole & Grab Bar that allows the user to rise from a sitting position with the pivoting Curve Grab Bar, which provides 4 hand grips at 4 different heights and locks in place at eight different points, every 45 degrees. The 4 vertical bars on the grab bar allow the user to gradually 'climb' to a standing position using a hand-over-hand technique. This transfer pole and grab bar provides a secure support for standing or for transferring a patient to a walker, wheelchair or other mobility device. Because wall mounts are not needed, this transfer aid can be moved to any room in your home whenever necessary. The slim design is ideal for transfers in tight spaces. It can be installed between the bathtub and the toilet, placed at your bedside, or conveniently, next to a sofa or chair. The main pole has rubber pads on the top and bottom protect the ceiling and floor and easily separates into two 53 inch pieces making it easy to transport. Includes wrench and no other tools are required for assembly. Fits ceiling heights 7 - 10 ft. Rust resistant Zinc plated steel.

Frequently Asked Security Pole & Grab Bar Questions:


  • How is it installed? The pole is tension mounted between the floor and the ceiling. It is not necessary to screw into the floor and ceiling, but screws are provided in case the user wants to.
  • What tools are needed for assembly? A wrench is included with each unit and no other tools are needed for assembly.
  • Does it damage the floor or ceiling? Rubber pads are on the bottom and top of the pole to protect the floor and ceiling.
  • What ceiling heights does it accommodate? 7 to 10ft ceilings.



    Security Pole and Grab Bar Instructions

    Security Pole & Grab Bar Specifications:

    Weight Capacity: 300 lbs.
    Weight of Product: 26 lbs.
    Fits ceiling heights: range of 7 - 10 ft.

name: Assist-A-Tray :: Lap Tray & Standing Aid
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Provides a convenient lap tray that swivels 360 degrees.
extended_description:
The Assist-A-Tray is two products in one! This innovative mobility aid is designed to assist you getting in and out of your couch or chair as well as provide a convenient lap desk that swivels 360 degrees out of the way when it isn't in use.

The Assist-A-Tray is a must have for anyone with impaired balance, arthritis back pain or recent surgery. Fully adjustable in both height and length, the Assist-A-Tray can be used by people of varying heights.



The solid footrests adjust in length to fit securely under the legs on either side of your favorite chair or sofa, firmly stabilizing the safety handle as you raise or lower yourself. The durable, solid, birchwood tray (with cupholder and utensil space) swivels 360°. Super-grip rubber pads protect the floor. Easy assembly - everything you need is included. Works well with most any couch, chair, recliner, or lift chair.

Standers Assist-A-Tray Assembly Instructions

Assist-A-Tray :: Lap Tray & Standing Aid Specifications:

Height of Tray: 26 to 32 inches.
Height Adjustment Handle: 34 to 40 inches.
Dimensions of Handle: 6 x 6 x 1.25 inch Diameter
Base Length Adjustment: 20 to 36 inches.
Weight: 19.5 lbs
Weight Limit of Tray: 30 lbs
Weight Limit of Handle: 250 lbs

name: Metro Walker :: Portable Folding Travel Walker
categories: Walker Accessories@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Compact, foldable, portable, easy to open and close.
extended_description:
Walk with confidence with the contemporary looking Metro Walker, one of the most compact, foldable, portable, easy to open and close Walkers available.

When folded, the Metro Walker is about four times smaller than the average walker. It fits in small spaces like the overhead bin on an airplane or a tiny car trunk. The unique design allows it to open and fold up effortlessly. To fold, just raise the easy-release lever with one hand and the walker collapses. To open, slide the handles apart.



The Metro Walker is lightweight but sturdy and strong, supporting up to 250 lbs. The innovative height adjustment feature adjusts to accommodate users from 4 feet 10 inches to 6 feet 8 inches with ease. You’ll also appreciate the 4 inch urethane front wheels and rear easy-glide feet, all contributing to ease of maneuverability.

Metro Walker :: Portable Folding Travel Walker Specifications:

Includes: two side pouches.
Weight: 6.5 lbs.
Weight Capacity: 250 lbs.
Collapsed Dimension: 6 x 4 x 32 inches.
Wheels: 4 inch diameter wheels.
Colors: amber (copper), rose, or walnut (charcoal).
Height Adjustment: 32 to 36 inches for users 4 feet 10 inches to 6 feet 8 inches.

name: Bed Cane
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Canes & Cane Accessories@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Helps make getting in and out of bed easier.
extended_description:
The Bed Cane provides steady support, making getting in and out of bed easier. 19 x 23 inch wood base fits between the mattress and box springs. Safety strap secures base to bed. Allows use of both hands to sit up on the side of the bed and then offers a means to maintain your balance while rising to a standing position.

The reversible handle installs on either side of the bed and has a comfortable cushion grip. The heavy gauge steel shaft, adjusts from 19 to 22 inches high from base. Remove pin to collapse, store or transport. Fits twin, full, queen and king size beds. 350 lb weight capacity.

Includes a free Bed Cane Organizer - $19.95 value!

This item weighs 12 pounds. Overweight shipping charges apply.

Ships via UPS Ground.

name: Car Caddie
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: Offers you a helping hand getting in or out of a car.
extended_description:
The Car Caddie™ is a car transfer aid designed for use by individuals with mobility disabilities. This unique product offers you a helping hand getting in or out of a car, van, or truck. This figure-eight style aid is constructed of nylon, loops around the car door window frame and adjusts for varying heights of vehicle windows, to meet your needs. The cushioned grip provides security and assistance while entering and exiting the automobile. Just pull on the comfortable cushion grip when you need assistance getting in or out of your vehicle.

You can carry it with you to use in other vehicles because it has an adjustable strap and does not need to be permanently installed.

The CarCaddie™ is intended to act as a means for balance and support. It is not intended to carry the full weight of an individual. Maximum weight bearing capacity is 250 pounds.

To install the Car Caddie in your vehicle, simply roll the window down enough to loop the Car Caddie around the top frame of the window. Then snap the buckle closed and adjust the length so you can reach the handle while seated. Position the Car Caddie along the frame in the most effective position that provides you maximum assistance. Roll the window up to secure the Car Caddie in place.

Car Caddie Specifications:

  • Nylon construction.
  • Cushioned handle.
  • Strap length adjusts from 7 to 16 inches.
  • Handle grip measures 5 inches.
  • Universal fit for any framed car window.
keywords: car caddie, help getting in, out car, truck, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired

The  b Car Caddie /b  loops around your car window and adjusts for varying heights of vehicle windows, to meet your needs. Just pull on the comfortable cushion grip when you need assistance getting in or out of your vehicle.">

name: BedCaddie
description: Provides help when sitting up in bed.
extended_description:
The BedCaddie enables people with general weakness or decreased back strength to pull themselves up to a sitting position in bed using the 3 tiered ladder system. This unique device has cushioned grip handles and is made of durable nylon.

The BedCaddie's ergonomic buckle design allows for easy attachment to the bed and accommodates most metal framed and wood framed beds.

Easy Assembly (No Tools Required)
  • Loop the lower BedCaddie strap around the bed frame.
  • Snap the easy connect buckle into place.
  • Adjust the strap length so that the first handle lies at waist level when lying in bed.

    • BedCaddie Specifications:

    Strap Length: Adjustable 48 – 84 inches.
    Length between handles: 12 inches.
    Handle Grip: 5 inches.
    Weight Capacity: 300 lbs.
    Product Weight: 2 lbs.

name: Bed Rail Advantage
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Offers a helping hand to a sitting position in bed.
extended_description:
The Bed Rail Advantage offers a helping hand to a sitting position in bed. The rail is 17 inches wide, offering ample surface space to grab onto. You can store small items in the included Bed Rail organizer so that they are within reach. If you don't need it all the time, the Bed Rail Advantage folds down flat for easy storage in a closet or under the bed.

Quality steel construction - heavy duty steel with powder coat providing long lasting quality. Portable handle folds down for storage and portability. Safety strap secures base to mattress. Foam Grip provides comfortable cushion grip; closed cell foam is easy to sanitize.

The Bed Rail Advantage requires no assembly. Simply slide the base between the box spring and mattress of any sized bed and secure the safety strap to the other side of the bed frame. The bed rail can be placed on either the left or right side of the bed and will accommodate deeper mattresses.

Ships via UPS Ground.

name: Akton Polymer Adaptive Flat Pad 1/2 inch
description: Pads can be cut and used for spot protection.
extended_description:
Adaptive Flat Pads are 100% smooth Akton Polymer. Adaptive Pads have multifunctional applications for traditional and non-traditional seating challenges. Can be used on products, such as arm pads, foot plates, head rests, leg rests, and splints or braces. Adaptive Pads are available in 1/4 inch 1/2 inch and 5/8 inch thicknesses. The Adaptive Pad when used as a cushion is intended for comfort only, not medical intervention.

AKTON polymer won't leak, flow, or bottom out, and it is tissue equivalent. It moves with wheelchair users, not against them, to reduce pressure and shear, the two leading causes of pressure sores. AKTON polymer is also radiolucent and easy to clean with standard disinfectant. It will not support microbiological growth, and it won't absorb body fluids or odors.

Please note: If 1/2 inch or 5/8 inch pad is used for a seating cushion, pad must be used with an Action brand cover for warranty to be in force.

Choose from the following models:
  • Adaptive Pad 16 x 16 x 1/2 inch #CAC5302
  • Adaptive Pad 18 x 16 x 1/2 inch #CAC5303
  • Adaptive Pad 18 x 18 x 1/2 inch #CAC541818
  • Adaptive Pad 20 x 20 x 1/2 inch #CAC6500
Choose Optional Basic Cover, or no cover option. The Basic Cover is made of a durable stretch knit material which is essential to utilize the protective cushion properties. Soft black pontae fabric, non skid bottom, zippered on 3 sides, removable and washable.

Shipping via UPS Ground.

This is a non-returnable hygiene item.

extended_description:
The Professional Gel Polymer Cushion with Basic Cover provides exceptional pressure relief for users at risk of skin breakdown or with a history of pressure ulcers. A full 1 5/8 inch Akton polymer provides effective weight distribution on a contour or flat surface.

The Professional Cushion provides an additional 50% cushioning against pressure, shear, and vibration. This is significant for those active clients using a power wheelchair who have increased concerns about bottoming-out and the potential effective of increased temperatures (due to foam insulation properties). Great for wheelchairs, power wheelchairs, scooters or for other situations that require prolonged sitting.

name: Pilot Flotation Pad with Basic Cover
description: A low profile cushion that provides exceptional pressure relief.
extended_description:
The Pilot Flotation Pad with Basic Cover is a low profile cushion that provides exceptional pressure relief for most users with a pressure ulcer history. One full inch of Akton Polymer provides immersion for bony prominences and protects clients with fragile skin integrity. This multi-use cushion is recommended for use on manual and power wheelchairs, truck or taxi seats, or for other uses requiring significantly reduced high-pressure areas, vibration and shear. The low profile allows users to effectively reach the floor for more efficient foot-assisted propulsion. It also conforms to pre-contoured foam or rigid cushions to maximize stability and positioning when required.

The Basic Cover is included with the Pilot Flotation Pad. The Basic Cover is made of a durable stretch knit material. Soft black pontae fabric, non skid bottom, zippered on 3 sides, removable and washable. An Incontinence Cover is available for an additional charge.

Choose from the following models:
  • CAC9000 16W x 16D
  • CAC9006 16W x 18D
  • CAC9005 18W x 16D
  • CAC9008 18W x 18D

name: Shear Smart Pad with Shear Smart Cover
description: Significantly reduces the effects of shear while providing superb user comfort.
extended_description:
The Shear Smart Pad, combined with a breathable double-layer Shear Smart cover, significantly reduces the effects of shear while providing superb user comfort. The cube construction of the pad surface allows air circulation, provides cushioning from mild impact, heat dissipation and the comfort of sitting on 9/16 inch Akton Polymer. This cushion will conform to contoured bases for additional support when required.

Adaptive Pads are 100% Akton Polymer. AKTON polymer won't leak, flow, or bottom out, and it is tissue equivalent. It moves with wheelchair users, not against them, to reduce pressure and shear, the two leading causes of pressure sores. AKTON polymer is also radiolucent and easy to clean with standard disinfectant. It will not support microbiological growth, and it won't absorb body fluids or odors.

The Shear Smart Cover is included with the Shear Smart Pad. The Shear Smart Cover provides significant relief from the effects of shearing and is an effective moisture barrier against incontinence. It offers a complete double layer of low shear material to allow for maximum movement on the pad. Replacement covers are available - please call our toll free number for pricing and availability 1.877.750.0376

Shipping via UPS Ground.

This is a non-returnable hygiene item.

name: Akton Polymer Adaptive Cube Pad
description: Can be adapted for use on backs.
extended_description:
Adaptive Cube Pads are 100% Akton Polymer. AKTON polymer won't leak, flow, or bottom out, and it is tissue equivalent. It moves with wheelchair users, not against them, to reduce pressure and shear, the two leading causes of pressure sores. AKTON polymer is also radiolucent and easy to clean with standard disinfectant. It will not support microbiological growth, and it won't absorb body fluids or odors.

Adaptive Cube Pads have multifunctional applications for traditional and non-traditional seating challenges. Pads are designed to be cut and used for spot protection in products such as arm pads, foot plates, head/leg rests and splints/braces. The Adaptive Cube Pad can be adapted for use on backs to support and reduce risk to bony prominence, on gel-based cushions to stop bottoming out, and on existing low-end cushions to provide increased shear and pressure reduction. The cubical design of the pad surface allows increased air circulation, cushioning from mild impact, heat dissipation and increased comfort.

Adaptive Cube Pad is available in 9/16 inch thickness. The Adaptive Cube Pad is not sold with a cover. If a cover is desired, please order a Shear Smart Pad.

Shipping via UPS Ground.

This is a non-returnable hygiene item.

Akton Polymer Adaptive Cube Pad Specifications:

Available in: 9/16 inch thickness.

name: HANDI-CARD :: Handicap Permit Visor Display
categories: Wheelchair Accessories@Walker Accessories@Scooter Accessories@Crutch Accessories@Canes & Cane Accessories@Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: Makes it convenient for the handicapped person to comply with displaying the permit.
extended_description:
The Handi-Card Handicap Permit Visor Display is a unique sun visor accessory that allows the easy storage and display of the state mandated handicap permit. Drivers and passengers that utilize the handicap parking spaces are required to have the state issued handicap permit visible when parking in designated spaces.

The Handi-Card handicap permit card storage and display makes it convenient for the handicapped person to comply with displaying the permit. It makes it easy to store the permit and then display it from the same location; just pull the sun visor down. The handicapped parking permit which has been stored is now ready to swivel into display position. When no longer in use, it swivels back into rest position, as the sun visor is returned to original position. Soft gray color complements most any vehicle interior. Holder measures 12 inches long and 6 1/2 inches wide.

The Handi-Card also improves safety. When properly used, it insures the driver’s view is not obstructed by the permit.

Handi-Card Handicap Permit Visor Display Specifications:

  • Color: Gray and black.
  • Measures: 12 x 6 1/2 inches.
  • Convenient storage for a handicap permit.
  • Easy way to display a handicap placard.
  • Made in USA.

name: Turn Easy Transfer Disc
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: The rotating pivot disk provides a smooth, controlled motion.
extended_description:
The Turn Easy Transfer Disc is a rotating pivot disk that makes transferring easy and safe. While helpful for most type of transfer, it is especially useful for transfers in close spaces when used as a standing pivot transfer aid. A rubber disc on bottom provides a non-slip surface while the top plastic disk slides against a fabric center. The non-friction carpet center works like ball bearings. This rotating pivot disk provides a smooth, controlled motion that makes the user feel secure. This transfer disc can also be used for sitting transfers and is ideal for getting in and out of a car seat. The flexible design allows the user to sit on the device and turn on a bed or chair. Portable and space saving transfer aid. The Turn Easy Transfer disc measures 15 inches diameter, 2/5 inch thick, and has a 280 lb weight capacity.

Turn Easy Transfer Disc Specifications:

  • Rotating pivot disc works like a lazy susan turntable and makes transferring easier.
  • Low profile design.
  • Measures 15 inch diameter, 2/5 inch width.
  • Weight capacity 280 pounds.

name: Beasy Transfer Boards
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: Gliding seat makes transfers easier.
extended_description:
The Beasy Transfer Boards provide users with a safe, comfortable and dignified way to transfer from bed to wheelchair, from wheelchair to commode or shower seat, to a car and back again.

Beasy transfer boards are totally portable. With the BeasyTrans™ Systems, most users can achieve regular access to an automobile. For some, this may mean a greater quality of life. The visiting of friends and relatives may be resumed. Educational and cultural undertakings can be attended. The systems may even allow the user to live at home while receiving outpatient care, rather than living in a long term facility and even for travelling!

It's a well documented fact: lifting leads to injury. For example, patient movement tasks statistically place nursing personnel in the top percentile of the U.S. labor force for back injuries. At the same time, the person being lifted is at risk for arm and brachial plexus type injuries as well as back injuries from being torqued or twisted. The risk of such injuries is tremendously reduced when lifting is eliminated. The frictionless, lateral slide is clearly the state of the art in patient transfer.

The design of the BeasyTrans™ Easy Transfer boards make it possible to apply sliding technology to a wide range of transfer and therapeutic functions in both the clinical and homecare environment.

For example, strategic placement of the Beasy seat under a draw sheet allows a minimum number of caregivers to easily perform such difficult transfers as bed to gurney, supine, or boosting of patients.

Because the seat easily rotates 360 degrees, the systems can be used for range of motion exercises for hands, feet or other body parts.


AVAILABLE BEASYTRANS™ MODELS
ModelDescription DimensionsWeight
BeasyTrans™Ideal for automobile transfers, for space-limited transfers and bed repositioning.40"L x 12"W6½lbs
BeasyGlyder™Designed for situations when the wheelchair arm is not removable or there is an obstacle present. 32"L x 10"W4½lbs.
Beasy II™ Ideal for smaller areas, such as transfers in the bathroom or for boosting in bed.27½"L x 12"W 4½lbs.

BeasyTrans™ Easy Transfer System Training Video

BeasyTrans Easy Transfer Board Training Video

Beasy Transfer Boards Specifications:

Weight Capacity: 400 lbs

Strap this clever pouch to your crutches, and you have an instant, hands-free carry bag. Its two roomy pockets hold an amazing range of necessities.

At school – It’s a handy saddlebag that keeps pens, notepads, and water bottles handy

At work – It’s a convenient crutch accessory that corrals cell phones, writing supplies, organizers—even a folding umbrella!

name: Standard Saddle Armrest Bag
categories: Scooter Accessories@Wheelchair Accessories/Wheelchair Packs, Bags & Totes
description: Large single pocket bag that mounts to most any armrest.
extended_description:
The Standard Saddle Armrest Bag is a large single pocket bag that mounts to most any wheelchair or scooter armrest. Ideal for keeping personal belongings close. The saddle bag straps over your scooter or wheelchair armrest to provide a handy storage area for keys, wallet, phone, glasses, or other personal items. Attaches to most armrests using unique "soft to the skin" mounting system. To attach, wrap the fabric with the soft hook material over the top of the armrest and secure it to the loop strap. The soft material allows your arm to move over the armrest without discomfort or skin irritation. Use the smaller hook and loop strap attached to the bottom of the bag to secure it to the seat post or frame and prevent the bag from swinging. This armrest bag can be mounted on inside or outside of armrest. Fits armrests from 1 inch round tubing to deluxe scooter armrests. Measures 10 inches wide x 8 inches long x 3 inches deep.

Standard Saddle Armrest Bag Specifications:

Measures: 10 inches wide x 8 inches long x 3 inches deep.

name: E Size Oxygen Tank Holder
categories: Scooter Accessories@Wheelchair Accessories/Wheelchair Packs, Bags & Totes
description: For carrying E size oxygen tanks and smaller size tanks.
extended_description:
This E Size Oxygen Tank Holder is a very safe and inexpensive way of carrying your oxygen cylinder on the back of your wheelchair or scooter. For carrying E size oxygen tanks and smaller size tanks. Constructed of high quality water-resistant fabric.

Designed for stability on wheelchairs with push handles and scooter style seats. Choose Oxygen Tank Holder for wheelchairs with push handles, or for scooter type chairs without push handles. Great for wheelchairs, power wheelchairs and scooters. For chairs without push handles, slide the adjustable horizontal strap of the harness over the seatback and then tighten. For manual wheelchairs, slide the straps over the push-handles.

E Size Oxygen Tank Holder Specifications:

  • Made in U.S.A.
  • Choose from option with straps to attach to chairs with or without push handles.
  • Carries oxygen tanks E Size and smaller.
  • Made of durable nylon material.
  • Color: Black.

name: Walker Holder for Scooters
description: Carry basic style walkers.
extended_description:
The Walker Holder for Scooters attaches to your scooter seat back to carry basic style walker wherever you go! Constructed of high quality water resistant fabric. Made in U.S.A. The walker holder is designed for stability on scooters or electric wheelchairs. To attach the walker carrier to your scooter, slip the harness over the top of your seat back so that the fastening straps and bottom pocket hang from the seat back, and then tighten the harness at the buckle. Place your folded walker down into the bottom pocket and then pull the fastening straps around your walker and buckle.

Walker Holder for Scooters Specifications:

  • Color: Black.
  • Made: in U.S.A.
  • Straps over the seat back of scooters.

name: Wheelchair Weather Chaps
description: Fits snugly around your lower body, keeping you dry.
extended_description:
The Wheelchair Weather Chaps lap, leg and feet cover keep you drier than a poncho because it fits snugly around your lower body, instead of draping over it. Wet feet are a thing of the past!

Slip your feet into the bottom pocket, then pull it over your legs and lap for waterproof protection. The WeatherChaps bottom is contoured so nothing gets caught in your wheels and there's no need to leave your seat to put it on. Removable fleece lining provides extra warmth, great for ball games and getting around!

Available in 3 sizes: Pediatric size for children and small adults, Adult size, and Extra Wide. Pediatric size measures 31 inches long, 26 inches wide at top, bottom pocket measures 12 inches, 14 inches tall, and 7 inches deep. Adult size measures 46 inches long, 28 inches wide at top, bottom pocket measures 12 inches wide, 16 inches tall and 8 inches deep. Top is secured with a 1 inch wide webbing strap. 1/2 inch velcro strap attached 4 inches above pocket secures wrap behind lower legs.

Wheelchair Weather Chaps Specifications:

Size: pediatric, adult and extra wide.

name: Scooter Tiller Cover Regular
description: Helps protect scooter controls from moisture.
extended_description:
The Scooter Tiller Cover Regular covers the standard size handle tiller on your scooter. Moisture can slip into the vulnerable, exposed areas of your scooter controls to cause electrical problems. The Scooter Tiller Cover slips over the top of your scooter tiller to protect it from moisture. The clear plastic top lets you see through the top. Openings let you slide your hands into the tiller cover to keep warm and dry, too. Your scooter tiller controls can be operated even with the Scooter Tiller Cover left on. Made from high-quality, durable nylon with urethane coating from years of durable, moisture-resistant use.

The Scooter Tiller Cover is also available in a small size for smaller scooter tillers.

Scooter Tiller Cover Regular Specifications:

Overall measurements: 16 inches wide, 9 inches deep, 15 inches high.
Circumference: 52 inches.

name: Joystick Cover
description: Slips over the joystick to protect it from moisture.
extended_description:
Moisture can slip into the vulnerable, exposed areas of your power wheelchair joystick to cause electrical problems. The Joystick Cover slips over the joystick to protect it from moisture. The plastic top lets you see through the top. Features an adjustable buckle to let you tighten the cover closely to the armrest and joystick, or leave it loose enough to slide your hand into the cover so that it stays warm and dry too.

The Joystick cover is made in the USA from high-quality durable nylon with urethane coating, for years of durable moisture-resistant use. Measures 13 inches long, 5 1/2 inches wide, 4 inches deep.

name: Sling Cane Seat - Discontinued
description: A convenient and lightweight folding seat cane that provides you with a comfortable seat to rest.
extended_description:
The Sling Cane Seat is a convenient and lightweight folding seat cane that provides you with a comfortable seat to rest on when open, and transforms into a sturdy quad walking cane when closed.

If walking leaves you tired and weak, then this cane seat offers a solution! Walk confidently with the Cane Sling Seat, knowing you can take a break when you need to rest. Lightweight and convenient, it folds and can easily be used as a 34" high walking cane with a soft, foam-grip handle. It also opens to a 22" high, sturdy four-legged nylon seat with an extra roomy 18" wide seat.

The sling style seat offers a wider seat with more comfort and stability than most other folding seat canes.

Sling Cane Seat - Discontinued Specifications:

Measures: Open: 22" height. Closed: 34" height.
Weight Capacity: 250 lbs.
Nylon sling seat measures: 18" x 8".
Weight: 2.4 lbs.

name: Deluxe Swivel Seat Cushion
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: Getting in and out of a car becomes much easier.
extended_description:
Getting in and out of a car becomes much easier with this swivel cushion. Carry the lightweight Deluxe Swivel Seat Cushion with you anywhere. The 360° turning capability makes it easy to get into whatever position is best for entering and exiting your car. The polyfoam-padded seat adds extra comfort to long drives. The 15 inch Deluxe Swivel Seat Cushion diameter accommodates most everyone. Enables a person to twist and turn while helping to prevent hip and back strain.

Deluxe cushion has 1 3/4 inches of soft foam cushion padded for added comfort. Ball bearing roller mechanism allows the Deluxe Swivel Seat Cushion to turn without binding. Durable flexible base with slip resistant bottom contours to seat and stays in place. Removable cover is machine washable. Weight capacity 300 pounds. 15 inch diameter. Item weighs 2.35 pounds.

**The Deluxe Swivel Seat Cushion has 1 3/4 inches of soft foam cushion padded for added comfort. If a thinner cushion is needed, consider the Auto Swivel Seat Cushion item # CMT96312.

Weight capacity: 300 lbs.
Turns: 360°
Weighs: 2.35 pounds.
Diameter: 15 inches.
Color: Camel or Grey

name: Portable Folding Suitcase Wheelchair and Scooter Ramps - Discontinued
description: Suitecase ramps bridge the gap over steps, curbs, and raised landings.
extended_description:
Single-fold Portable Wheelchair Ramps for scooters and all wheelchair types. Designed to bridge the gap over steps, curbs, and raised landings. Simply unfold the hinged wheelchair ramp and position it for maximum safety and support. Folds in half to be carried like a suitcase. Made of aluminum and features a durable, non-skid driving surface.

Consult equipment owner guide for proper degree of incline. Never exceed its recommendations.

Portable Suitcase Wheelchair and Scooter Ramps - General Guidelines:

  • Never exceed your equipment's recommendations.
  • 11-13 degrees maximum with a patient in the chair.
  • 15 degrees maximum for walking behind & pushing up an empty chair.
  • 17 degrees maximum for loading an empty chair.

name: Freedom Non Skid Cup Holders
description: Patented non skid vacuum system.  It Won't Move!
extended_description:
Collapsible, weighted , non skid, no tip drinkholder with integral base has a cork bottom to absorb moisture. Patented locking leg prevents the drink holder from collapsing. Hit it with a hammer - this cupholder will not move or tip over. Great for wheelchair trays, over bed tables, or table tops.

Click Here to see the Freedom Cup Holder Video if you have high speed Internet (DSL or Cable).

Click Here to see the Freedom Cup Holder Video if you have low speed Internet (Dial Up).

The Freedom Suction Pad is a patented non skid, no slip vacuum system pad. When you place the cupholder with attached pad on a flat surface and push down with slight pressure, it creates a suction system that will not move even if you bump it or hit it. Place the base on a clean surface and it stays in place! No tipping, no slipping. The suction grip in the base is incredibly strong, but very easy to release: just lift a corner of the base pad to move the cup holder to another location, or to clean up. Cup holder folds flat for easy storage.

CFP131 Freedom Standard size cupholder. Standard size drinkholder adjusts to hold 6 oz. to 16 oz. glasses, mugs, cans or bottles.
CFP191 Freedom Large size cup holder. Large Cupholder adjusts to hold 16 oz. to 46 oz. glasses, mugs, cans or bottles.

Freedom Non Skid Cup Holders Specifications:

Standard holds: 6 oz. to 16 oz. glasses, mugs, cans or bottles.
Large holds: 16 oz. to 46 oz. glasses, mugs, cans or bottles.

Attach clamp to almost any standard tubing element - including wheelchair frames, walkers, scooters, rollators, and bed rails. Clamping mechanism easily tightens securely on any upright or horizontal tubing.

Open holder then adjust arms to hold 16 oz to 46 oz cups, glasses or bottles with up to a 4 inch diameter base. Holder closes flat to only 1 inch thick - no problem for going thru doorways. Patented internal support leg prevents accidental closure if bumped.

This straw features two flexible sections in the center PLUS one near each end which allows you to bend it to the position you need for your best access!! These straws combine flexibility and stability to provide hands free drinking.

The Large Diameter Drinking Straw Holder clips on to the edge of a glass and holds the straw in place. The Drinking Straw Holder positions a straw at the correct angle for hands free drinking. Use this special clip, the Sipper Clip, with either the Long Flexible Straw or the Super Long Straw.

name: In-Step LaserCane
description: Provides a safe, obstacle-free visual cue, to enable Parkinson’s patients.
extended_description:
The In-Step LaserCane is a cane with laser light designed for use by people with ataxia, Parkinson's disease, stroke, and other neurological disabilities. Walking can be smooth again with the LaserCane! The laser beam line appears when you place the cane down and disappears when you lift the cane.

This height-adjustable aluminum cane with laser light projects a line in front of the user to provide a visual cue to interrupt episodes of freezing. The cane is equipped with an on/off switch in the handle, and the laser is weight-activated. The line appears when weight is applied to the cane and disappears when the cane is lifted. All wires and laser components are hidden inside the cane.

The LaserCane™ laser walking cane is useful for patients with Parkinson's disease, ALS, abnormal gait patterns and used for stroke rehabilitation. The laser is powered by two AA batteries, which are easy to replace and typically last at least six months.

In-Step LaserCane Specifications:

  • Power: 2 AA batteries.
  • Battery Life: 6 months.
  • Height adjustable for users from 5 feet to 6 feet 1 inches tall.
keywords: lasercane, laser cane, in step lasercane, laser walking cane, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired
imagecaption2: In Step Laser Cane with red laser light
title: In Step Laser Cane for Parkinsons
metatags: <META name="keywords" CONTENT="lasercane, laser cane, in step lasercane, laser walking cane, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired "><META name="description" CONTENT="Walking can be smooth again with the LaserCane! Simply take normal steps as your LaserCane™ projects a bright red line across your path. The laser beam provides a safe, obstacle-free visual cue, which can enable Parkinson’s patients and others to break “freezing” episodes and increase stride length.">

name: Ultra Slick Transfer Board
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: Dramatically reduces the effort required to transfer.
extended_description:
The composite outer layer of the UltraSlick® produces a constant slick surface that requires no waxing and never needs refinishing. The plastic surface over layers of select hardwood increase strength so the board is thin (7/16") and very lightweight. A lacquered finish on the back allows for easy placement of board, while reducing board movement during transfers.

"Using [this] board, we have been able to teach high Quads to transfer independently. Prior to using the UltraSlick®, these patients required help to transfer." Kathy Dunn, rehabilitation clinical specialist

"The UltraSlick® is also helpful in wet transfers." Kathy Roy, Director of Spinal Cord Physical Therapy, VAMC San Diego

The UltraSlick Transfer Boards are available in 24", 27" and 30" lengths.

Ultra Slick Transfer Board Specifications:

Weight limit : 250 lbs.
Board width: 8 inches.

name: Wheelchair Amputee Board
description: Provides maximum support to the affected limb.
extended_description:
The Wheelchair Amputee Board provides a leg rest for below knee amputee. It helps to maintain comfort and proper positioning of the stump to assist in preventing knee flexion contracture of the amputated limb and edema in the stump.

This durable 5-ply birch plywood box is designed to be placed under the wheelchair cushion to provide maximum comfort and support to the user. The Amputee Board comes with one insert. An additional insert is available for a double amputee. Insert measures 6" x 28 " with a 6" x 9" x 3" vinyl covered pad. The vinyl covered pad provides maximum support to the affected limb. Finish is lacquered natural wood. The box is available in dimensions of [16" x 16" x 1"] & [16" x 18" x1"].

For double amputee, order amputee board and additional insert.

Wheelchair Amputee Board Specifications:

Insert measures: 6" x 28 "
Pad measures 6" x 9" x 3"

Constructed from plywood and covered with black vinyl over 1-inch foam, the Hemi Arm Positioner is 5 inches wide and 19 inches long. name: Leg Loop Leg Lift
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Leg Lifters
description: Foot loop stays conformed to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable grip.
extended_description:
The Leg Loop Leg Lift allows a person to safely and effectively reposition the leg and foot onto a footrest, a bed, into a car, etc. by providing a more secure grip than merely tugging on a piece of clothing. The Leg Loop™ consists of two loops - a hand loop and a foot loop, one at each end of a rigid middle section.

The Leg Loop Leg Lift helps people with limited lower extremity strength lift the leg and foot. It is designed to help people who have medical conditions in which they either partially or completely lose the ability to independently move their leg. Paraplegia, hemiplegia, paraparesis, hip surgery, and knee surgery are fairly common examples.

The foot loop stays open until the strap is pulled and then conforms to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable grip. Rigid middle section allows for easy maneuverability. Once pulled, the loop closes and conforms to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable fit. This, combined with the rigid middle section" he asserts "makes it easier to place on the foot than other leg lifts and reduces the risk of the foot falling out and becoming injured.

Leg Loop Leg Lift Specifications:

Construction: 1 inch (2.54 cm) wide, high strength, nylon webbing.
Length: 36 inches (91.4 cm).

description: Holds a drink securely on wheelchair frame, bed rails or other tubular frames.
extended_description:
Wheelchair Drink Holder holds a drink securely on wheelchair frame, bed rails or other tubular frames. This wheelchair cup holder is made of tough plastic and is slotted on two sides to hold one or two handled cups and mugs. The plastic clamp has a large easy-to-tighten lever knob and can be positioned to the outside, inside, or front of the wheelchair. The mounting clamp fits a 1 inch diameter tube and comes with a sleeve to reduce it to fit 7/8 inch tube frames. This wheelchair cup holder will accommodate beverage containers 2 1/2 to 3 inches in diameter, including bottle, cans, glasses, mugs, and cups. Cup holder measures 5 inches high and 4 inches wide.

  • Slotted to hold cups and mugs with handles.
  • Fits 7/8 and 1 inch diameter tubing.
  • Measures 5 x 4 inches.

name: SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: Designed for use by people who are able to stand but cannot readily move their legs.
extended_description:
The SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc is designed for use by patients who are able to stand but cannot readily move their legs. For maximum support and safety for both the patient and the helper, we recommend that either a transfer belt or sling be used in conjunction with the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc.

An individual with impaired mobility from paralysis or limited upper body functions can use the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc unassisted in a very efficient way. If the patient cannot use his/her upper extremities a helper will be needed.

The SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc is placed on the floor with the label facing downwards. The patient's feet are to be positioned completely on the disc to facilitate a smooth transfer and reduce back strain on both patient and helper. The handle of the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc should be placed facing the patient, to prevent interfering with the feet of the helper. The helper should place one of his/her feet on the disc to safely monitor and control the transfer. After using the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc, it should immediately be removed from the floor to avoid accidents.

Because of the lightweight and convenient grip handle, the SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc is easy to use and carry. The Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc is made of three high quality polymer plates, one turning on top of the other. The SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc is also equipped with anti-glide tape on both sides to prevent slipping on the floor or when a patient is standing on the disc.

Transfer between a chair and a wheelchair: The disc is "locked" in place when the helper places his/her heel comfortably on the floor and the rest of his/her foot firmly on the plate between the feet of the patient. The patient wears a transfer belt and the helper holds on to the handles while guiding the patient through the transfer.

Transfer between a wheelchair and a toilet: Proper use of the disc in this situation is identical to above, except it is safer and easier with two helpers. The helper(s) can use their other, free hand(s) to help undress the patient before placing him/her on the toilet.

Transfer between a wheelchair and a bed: Before you move a patient from a bed to a wheelchair, you should make sure that the wheelchair is positioned as close to the bed as possible, with the wheels locked. (For better control and safety, always have the patient wear a transfer belt.

The Safety Sure Transfer Disc is available in 3 sizes, weighs 2 pounds and is 1/2 inch thick.
CMT5081 13 inch diameter
CMT5082 15 inch diameter
CMT5083 18 inch diameter

Weight limit 300 lbs.

SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc Specifications:

Weight limit: 300 lbs
Thick: 1/2 inch

name: SafetySure Mary's Aide Transfer Sling
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Gait and Transfer Belts@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Provides caregivers with a secure hold and control during patient transfers.
extended_description:
The SafetySure Mary's Aide Transfer Sling provides caregivers with a secure hold and control during patient transfers. The Mary's Aide transfer sling is made of woven nylon with hook and loop closures. Shaped like and undergarment, it is worn over the patient's clothing. During the transfer, the Mary's Aide stays securely in place without binding or riding up. name: Auto Handy Bar Transfer Aid
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Help make getting in and out of your car easier.
extended_description:
The Auto Handy Bar Car Aid offers support to help you out of the car safely and securely.

The device locks securely, and reliably, into position. In addition, the Auto Handy Bar Transfer Aid is easy to insert and remove, it is strong, durable and affordable. The material is forged steel with corrosion resistant plating. At just 0.7 lb., and measuring approx. 9 in. long, the Handybar™ is sufficiently lightweight, and compact, for it to be carried around in a handbag or pack.

The precisely shaped nose locks the Handybar™ securely into position with little effort and enables it to be removed just as easily. It is also cranked, or bent, over its length to enable it to be reversed to give just the right height and angle of grip for getting in and out of a vehicle. Smaller, more compact cars tend to be lower down, closer to the ground making it even more difficult to get in and out of them. Fortunately, the U-type striker plate is one of the most rugged components in a vehicle being designed to keep the door closed in the event of a side-impact crash. There is a striker on each of the door pillars enabling the Handybar™ to be used by both the driver and passengers.

The Handy Bar also includes a seat belt cutter and side window breaker. Weight limit 350 lbs.

Winner of Best New Product, Medtrade West April 2001 Prescribed by Doctors & Recommended by Health professionals Fits over 170 million vehicles in North America.

Auto Handy Bar Transfer Aid Specifications:

Weight Capacity: 350 lbs
Material: forged steel shaft
Fits: 95% of all newer cars.

The gentle hydraulic action of the UPlift™ Seat Assist easily raises or lowers a person to or from most any chair and to help make standing up or getting up much easier. The patented “flex seat” design of the Seat Assist eliminates the “sliding” feeling of other seat lifts.

name: Handicapped Placard Hanger
categories: Wheelchair Accessories@Walker Accessories@Scooter Accessories@Crutch Accessories@Canes & Cane Accessories@Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids/Car Transfer Aids
description: Fastens your handicap placard safely and securely to the neck of your rear-view mirror.
extended_description:
The Handicapped Placard Hanger is a small compact hook that makes the process of displaying and removing a handicap parking permit effortless. The "J" hook design fastens safely and securely to the neck of your rear-view mirror. That area is not even visible from the driver’s seat, and it is the main reason why parking tags often tear during the process. Simply hang your placard on this handy hanger and go, it’s that easy!

Invented by a handicapped permit owner who became very frustrated every time he tried to hang his parking tag from the mirror, this ingenious product has made life a lot easier for many people. The mirror arm that handicap parking tags hang from cannot be seen from the driver’s seat. That means you have to lean forward, crank your head and neck and basically twist your body into positions it was never designed to be in just so you can see where to hang your tag.

It is considered a traffic violation if you drive with your handicap placard still on display almost everywhere in the US and across Canada. According to the law, a moving vehicle that has a parking permit hanging from the mirror is technically obstructing the driver's view of the road. The Placard Hanger™ promotes safe driving habits, provides unrestricted visibility while in your vehicle, and makes it easy to remove your handicap placard before putting your automobile in gear.

Handicapped Placard Hanger Specifications:

  • J shaped hook design.
  • Constructed of special 11-gauge aluminum wire.
  • Easily hangs a handicap placard for display.

name: Posey Deluxe Wheelchair Lateral Arm Support
description: The wheelchair arm support prevents leaning and provides a comfortable arm rest.
extended_description:
The Posey Deluxe Wheelchair Lateral Arm Support is a contoured arm support that helps provide additional lateral trunk support to the wheelchair armrest. It is ideal for individuals who lean laterally over the wheelchair armrest. The Deluxe Lateral Arm Support adds padding to the top and inside face of the wheelchair armrest and provides a comfortable, convenient arm rest to facilitate arm use and upper extremity rehabilitation. This arm rest support is made of padded foam covered with soft, water-resistant vinyl which can be wiped clean. Optional hook-and-loop positioning straps are included to stabilize arm position. The Deluxe Lateral Arm Support measures 16 inches long and 7 inches wide. It also adds 2 inches to the height of the armrest.

    Posey Deluxe Lateral Arm Support Specifications:


  • Helps prevent lateral leaning.
  • Provides a convenient elevated armrest.
  • Made of padded foam covered with vinyl.
  • Measures 16 x 7 inches.

name: Wander Alarm with Motion Detector
description: Detects movement of a person in a bed, chair, room or doorway.
extended_description:
The Wander Alarm with Motion Detector can prevent a loved one or patient from wandering away. It can detect the movement of a person in a bed, chair, room or doorway. A small receiver (remote monitoring device) can be mounted wherever convenient, and the chimes either sound or send a discreet signal up to 100 feet away.

Wander Alarm with Motion Detector Specifications:

No batteries included: requires two 9 volt batteries (one for the sender, and one for the receiver).
Receiver range: up to 100 feet depending on building construction.
Set to chime: the alarm will sound at the sensor.
Set to remote: a signal will be sent to the pager/receiver.

name: Wireless Wander Door Alarm
description: Alerts caregivers or staff when a family member, resident or patient attempts to leave a room or window, or wanders into an unsupervised area.
extended_description:
The Wireless Wander Door Alarm alerts caregivers or staff when a family member, resident or patient attempts to leave a room or window, or wanders into an unsupervised area. This wireless alarm system has a door or window sensor which attaches easily to a door and doorjamb or to a window and window frame.

This two-part alarm system has a door sensor mounted in the resident's room and a wireless receiver/alarm carried by the caregiver. The receiver will alert you with a beep or vibrate. The door sensor attaches easily to both sides of the doorjamb. When the door or window is opened, the electronic signal is sent to the remote receiver. The signal alerts the caregiver that the resident is either wandering out of safe range or entering a non-supervised area. Excellent for home use - offers caregivers the peace of mind and freedom to attend other duties.

System includes a battery in the sending unit and mounting instructions.

Wireless Wander Door Alarm Specifications:

Range: up to 100 feet.
Alerting chime ring level: 80 to 85 decibels.
Sending unit uses: one 9V battery (not included).
Receiver uses: one 12V battery (included).

extended_description:
The Wireless Personal Pager allows you to summon help without having to yell. With the push of a button, bedridden or disabled individuals can summon help up to 100 feet away without having to raise their voice.

This pager helps when you are caring for a bedridden loved one or a patient that is at risk for falling and you need to be in constant contact with them. The Wireless Personal Pager is a reliable and affordable paging system that enables your patient to contact you from up to 100 feet away.

Wireless Personal Pager Specifications:

Two alarm modes: chime and vibrate.
Dimensions (receiver): 3.5" W x 2.5" H x 1" D.
Dimensions (transmitter): 2.75" H x 1.5" W x 0.75" D.
Transmitter uses: one 12 volt battery (included).
Receiver uses: two AA batteries (not included).

name: Wheelchair Anti Rollback Device
description: Prevents a wheelchair from rolling backward.
extended_description:
The Safe T Mate Wheelchair Anti Rollback Device prevents a wheelchair from rolling backward by grabbing the tires as the user attempts to sit or stand. The center override lever makes backing up unoccupied wheelchair easy, or opt to remove lever without effecting operation of anti-rollback device.

How it works: The Anti-Rollback System attaches to the rear of most sling seat wheelchairs. A lever directly contacts the underside of the seat and is mechanically linked to the brake arms. If the patient begins to stand, the brake arms clamp down on the wheels, preventing the chair from rolling backwards. When the patient is seated, the brake arms automatically unlock, and the chair can continue to roll freely.

The Safe-t-mate Anti-Rollback device for wheelchairs is available with an optional battery-powered integrated alarm that sounds when anti-rollback device is engaged. This alarm will alert facility staff of clients movement. An adapter kit for heavy seat cushions is also available.

The Safe-t-mate Wheelchair Anti Rollback Device is easy to install and fits most wheelchairs.
  • CSM22S Standard model fits 16 - 20 inch wide wheelchairs
  • CSM22W Wide model fits 22 - 24 inch extra wide wheelchairs
  • CSM22A Standard model with Alarm fits 16 - 20 inch wheelchairs and includes the integrated alarm
  • CSM22WA Wide model with Alarm fits 22 - 24 inch wide wheelchairs and includes the integrated alarm
keywords: safe t mate wheelchair anti rollback device, wheelchair anti rollback device, wheelchair anti roll device, mobility aids, products, supplies, wheelchair, walker, gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired
