name: The Casbar
description: Makes most any wheelchair easier to push and handle.
extended_description:
The Casbar makes most any wheelchair easier to push and handle. The ergonomically designed metal bar slides over the handgrips on a wheelchair and is easily attached or removed using the thumbscrews.

The unique Casbar design allows a caregiver to push a wheelchair with only one hand, provides increased control, and better positions the caregiver’s arm to reduce wrist and arm fatigue.

Measure the back of the wheelchair between handgrips to determine the correct size of the Casbar. The Casbar is available in 16 and 20 inch lengths. (Standard 18 inch length is no longer available.)

The Casbar Specifications:

Available in: 16 and 20 inch lengths

name: Cane Stay
description: Helps keep your cane from slipping or falling.
extended_description:
The Cane Stay is an affordable, easy to use walking cane holder. Use this walking cane holder anywhere to keep your cane upright without worrying about it falling. Cane Stay can be used where you need it most - on tables, counter tops, or leaning against walls. Once in place, Cane Stay won't slip and your cane won't fall.

The unique design of this walking cane holder allows users with a disability to easily position the cane holder. Squeeze the Cane Stay to fit standard 3/4 inch diameter or larger canes. It is easy to both attach and remove which facilitates sharing among multiple canes. Your cane will not slide or slip. No more bending and reaching to retrieve your cane after it has dropped or slipped to the floor. Great for use in the bathroom for sanitation purposes.

Cane Stay Specifications:

Fits: standard size canes 3/4 inch diameter or more.
Length: 3 inches.
Width: 4 inches.
Height: 0.7 inches.
Manufactured: USA.
Color: black.
Material: strong, durable, pliable plastic.

name: Manual Wheelchair Cover
categories: Wheelchair Accessories@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: All weather cover for manual wheelchairs.
extended_description:
Protect a Folding Manual Wheelchair during travel or storage from weather and dust with a durable Wheelchair Cover. With convenient quick release buckle and Velcro side access, the wheelchair cover can easily slip over the arm on a wheelchair lift. Features a front sewn elastic band which wraps tightly around the wheelchair footrests, and a rear cinch drawstring to secure the cover bottom around the wheels.

Includes (4) grommet tie down points for highway travel and a handy carrying pouch. Made in the USA. Comes with a 1 year Manufacturer's warranty.

*Please note: The Folding Manual Wheelchair Cover is not intended for highway use without using a securing device such as rope or cords over the top and through the grommet holes. This will reduce the amount of excess room under the cover and prevent billowing at high speeds.

Manual Wheelchair Cover Specifications:

Measures: 38 L x 9 W x 44 H inches.
Includes: carrying pouch.
Warranty: Manufacturer's 1 year.
Made in: the USA.

">

name: Power Chair Covers
description: Helps protect a power wheelchair from the weather during carrier transportation.
extended_description:
Power Chair Covers are specifically designed to protect a power wheelchair from the weather during carrier transportation and from dust during storage. Easily slip the cover over a powerchair and tie it down using either the (4) metal grommets found on regular cover models, or by the (12) reinforced tie down loops found on heavy duty cover models.

*Please note: Powerchair Mobility Covers are not intended for highway use without using a securing device such as rope or cords over the top and through the grommet holes or tie-down loops. This will reduce the amount of excess room under the cover and prevent billowing at high speeds.

Power Chair Covers Specifications:

Warranty: Manufacturer's 1 year.
Measures: 38H x 18W x 44L inches.
Circumference: 124 inches.
Regular Model: 4 metal grommet tie down points.
Heavy Duty Model: 12 reinforced tie down loops.
Made: in the USA.

name: 2 piece Scooter Seat and Tiller Cover Set
description: Provides protection from the elements.
extended_description:
The Diestco 2 Piece Scooter Seat and Tiller Cover helps protect your electric scooter seat and tiller from moisture by preventing any unwanted water damage to your power scooter. It works great with your power scooter seat and tiller on lifts or for storing outside. When using the tiller cover in operations, controls are still visible. The seat cover not only protects your seat from moisture, you can also sit in your seat while the cover is on. Locking drawstring keeps it tight around the base of your seat.

These covers form fit to your power mobility vehicle. Simply slip it over your scooter and use the locking drawstrings along the bottom to secure.

(Seat and Tiller Covers are also sold separately).

2 piece Scooter Seat and Tiller Cover Set Specifications:

Material: Water-resistant nylon fabric and plastic.
Attachment: Locking drawstrings.
Includes: Regular Tiller cover MDV2100 and Seat Cover MDV2010

name: Sleeve Guards
description: Helps protect shirt sleeves, jackets, and skin against moisture and dirt.
extended_description:
Sleeve Guards are made to slip comfortably over your forearms to protect your shirt sleeves, jackets, and skin against moisture and dirt. Sleeve Guards are typically used by manual wheelchair users, but they can be used by anyone looking to protect their arms.

Dirt and moisture can ruin expensive clothes. So can wheel wear. Sleeve Guards slip over your forearms to protect your jacket and shirt sleeves. Once you get where you're going, slip them off of your clean sleeves.

Sleeve Guards Specifications:

Size: one size fits all.

name: Easy to Use Walker Coasters
categories: Walker Accessories/Walker Balls, Slides & Glides@Featured Products
description: Helps move your walker in all directions.
extended_description:
Easy to Use Walker Coasters feature a bright color so the walker feet are easy to see. These lightweight footpads are highly visible, making them easy for you to see where the legs of the walker are to avoid tripping or stumbling. Made of a special polymer blend, durable plastic that easily glides in all directions over concrete, carpets and linoleum floors with very little effort.

The unique design of these replacement walker footpads includes an O-ring to securely attach the Walker Coasters without tools. Unlike walker balls and tennis balls, Walker Coasters do not absorb water or collect debris.

Easy to Use Walker Coasters Specifications:

Fits: all standard 1 inch walker legs.
Width: 2 ½ inch diameter.
Height: 1 ½ inches.
Material: smooth, durable plastic.
Color: bright yellow.
Includes: package of 2.

description: Helps keep essential items handy without interfering with mobility.

EZ Access Universal Crutch Carry - On keeps essential items handy without interfering with mobility. This bag is specifically made for underarm crutches or forearm crutches. Universal fit easily attaches to crutch handles using adjustable hook and loop straps.

Features a large inside pocket, front zipper pocket, small side pocket and outer mesh pocket. Removal is simple and easy too. Ideal for storing and carrying keys, glasses, papers, water bottles and other personal items.

Depth: 1 ¾ inches.

name: EZ - Access 2 ft Suitcase Ramp Signature SS2
categories: Wheelchair Accessories@Scooter Accessories@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Helps make the maneuverability of wheelchairs or scooters much easier.
extended_description:
The new EZ - Access 2 ft Suitcase Ramp Signature SS2 is an ultra-strong, single-fold ramp providing the safety and strength required while remaining lightweight and portable. The Signature Series Suitcase Ramps feature an extruded non-skid tread for superior traction, and a self-adjusting bottom transition plate for easy conversion from ramp to ground. The hinge features a no-pinch, non-protruding live hinge for safe, silent, and maintenance free operation.

The ergonomically designed flexible, non-breakable handles offer convenient carrying and a comfortable grip. The 800 lb weight capacity allows the ramp to safely support power scooters, power wheelchairs and manual wheelchairs. Welded construction provides long-term durability and safety.

Incline Chart

Made of: Aluminum.

description: 16" by 9" bag featuring outside pocket with zippered compartment for cell phone and interior slots for credit cards & ID.
extended_description:
The Granny Jo Products Wheelchair, Walker, or Scooter Bag attaches easily by using adjustable straps and clip fasteners. The bag is 100% cotton featuring an outside pocket with zippered compartment for a cell phone and interior slots for credit cards and ID.

This 16" by 9" Wheelchair/Walker/Scooter Bag is 100% cotton duck with Velcro closure. The bag features adjustable length straps that are secured with clip fasteners.

The interior of the bag has a keyring holder and slots for credit cards or ID. The outside has a pocket with a zippered compartment ideal for holding a cell phone.

For wheelchair use the bag can be attached on the inside or outside of the chair's arm depending on the wheel configuration or hung on the back of the chair.

Scooter users can adjust the straps to fit the width of the arm on their machine.

Granny Jo Wheelchair, Walker or Scooter Bag Specifications:

Attaches: using adjustable straps and clip fasteners.
Construction: 100% cotton duck with Velcro closure.
Measures: 16 x 9 inches.
Package: one Walker/Wheelchair Bag.

name: Granny Jo Fleece Wheelchair Poncho
categories: Wheelchair Accessories@Walker Accessories@Scooter Accessories@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Just the thing to put on quickly when feeling a chill.
extended_description:
Granny Jo Ponchos are warm, cozy, lightweight, soft, and are longer on the arm than traditional ponchos and call to mind a warm hug. Ponchos are a wonderful upper body wrap for wheelchair users, and are just the thing to put on quickly when feeling a chill.

Simple tasks like putting on and taking off a sweater or jacket can present challenges. A poncho that goes on and comes off easily can be a big help.

Double stitching surrounding the notch collar and hem is just one of the details that make the new Granny Jo Poncho a warm, welcome addition to any wardrobe. The fleece poncho is soft, warm, and cuddly and full cut.

The large/extra large poncho measures 27.5 inches from the neckline to the hem all the way around the poncho.

Simple movements related to putting on or taking off a sweater present a challenge for wheelchair or scooter users. A poncho that goes on and comes off easily can be a big help.

This Fleece Poncho is ideal for men or women desiring a lightweight warm, shoulder covering while reading or resting. This poncho has attractive double stitching on the hem and neckline, a roomy front pocket and is available in sm/med, and large/x-large for men and women.

Granny Jo Fleece Wheelchair Poncho Specifications:

Laundry: Machine wash and dry.
Large/extra large poncho measures: 27.5 inches from the neckline to the hem all the way around the poncho.

name: Pendulator Universal Cup Holder
description: Keeps your beverage in the upright position and helps reduce spills!
extended_description:
The Pendulator Universal Cup Holder's unique design allows it to pivot to help reduce spills! This holder helps keep your beverage in an upright position. The wheelchair cup holder is constructed of high-density plastic to help withstand the wear and tear of regular use. Includes a mounting kit for attaching to flat surfaces or 1 inch square or round tubing.

This cup holder is not only for wheelchairs but also for golf carts, lawn mowers, tool boxes, and more! Holds cans, cups, bottles, and travel mugs from 12 ounces to 20 ounces.

Cup Holder Capacity: 12 ounce to 20 ounce cans, cups, bottles, and travel mugs.

name: See 4 Safety Mobility Light
description: Hands free automatic safety light for walkers, canes or rollators.
extended_description:
The See 4 Safety Mobility Light provides users of walkers, canes and rollators with an easily attached automatic light source. The light turns itself on when in motion and when it senses a low level light environment. The “intelligent” light turns itself off after 30 seconds if there is no motion or when it senses a well-lit environment. The patented, hands-free, automatic illumination is the only personal visual aid that knows when to turn itself “on” and “off”. By providing illumination the Mobility Light increases patient/user safety.

The Safety Mobility Light provides hands free illumination from 3 super-bright LED lights. Three bright LED lights are powered by two AAA batteries (included). The light uses two sensors. Only when it is in a low light environment and in use will the light illuminate. Saves batteries and time.

See 4 Safety Mobility Light Instructions

See 4 Safety Mobility Light Specifications:

Includes: 2 standard AAA batteries.
Length: 7 ¾ inches.
Width: 4 ⅝ inches.
Height: 1 ½ inches.

name: Gel Crutch Top Covers
description: Designed for the ultimate in crutch comfort and skin protection!
extended_description:
Designed for the ultimate in crutch comfort and skin protection! Gel Crutch Top Covers can aid in healing existing sores and/or abrasions.

The Gel Crutch Top Pad is installed over the existing TOP foam and secured with Velcro.

The cover is a chloroprene rubber with a nylon surface, similar to wet suit material. Inside is open cell foam and a polyurethane solid GEL. It is referred to as a ‘SOLID GEL’ and will not leak out.

Gel Ovations ™ products incorporate a latex-free, solid GEL and have a durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. They protect bony prominences and reduce abrasions, shear, and harmful pressure-related problems.

Pair of GEL and Foam Crutch Top Covers stretch to fit the top of all standard crutches. Installed over the existing foam crutch pads and secured with Velcro®.

Do NOT put pads/covers in a washing machine.
Do NOT submerge them in water or agitate.
Do NOT put in clothes dryer.

With HEATED DRYING turned OFF, you may wash them in the top rack of an automatic dishwasher. Alternatively, wipe the surface with any normal household soap or cleaning solution that is not irritating and to which you are not allergic.

Gel Crutch Top Covers Specifications:

Fits: all standard crutches.
Sold as: a pair.
Material: medical grade silicone, solid polymer polyurethane.

name: Recliner Riser
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Helps make standing or sitting easier.
extended_description:
The Recliner Risers attach quickly and easily to the wooden base of your favorite recliner. When you stand from the typical recliner, it tilts forward, dropping the arms and seat of an already low chair by 3 - 4 inches. Simply raising the chair by 5 or 6 inches, necessary for independent standing, makes it dangerously unstable. Stander has developed a safe and easy solution!

When Recliner Risers are installed, they raise a chair 1 ¾ inches and limit the forward tilt allowing an additional 3 - 4 inches of lift. The 4 - 6 total inches of extra support gives a weakened person a biomechanical advantage and enables them to stand on their own.

The patented design raises your effective seat height 4 - 6 inches while only raising your chair 1 ¾ inches. The Recliner Riser helps give your chair a lift.

Recliner Risers Instructions

Recliner Riser Specifications:

Riser Dimensions: 1.75" high x 2.5" wide x 6" long.
Weight Capacity: 800 lbs (including furniture).
Includes: four Recliner Risers, two Rocker Limiters, 16 screws, Velcro, and instruction manual.

description: Helps make transfer in and out of bed easy.
extended_description:
The Bedside Econorail is made of aircraft-grade, hardened anodized aluminum, it weighs less than 2 lbs, and supports up to 300 lbs. The Econorail is the smallest, most affordable bed rail on the market. The full size cushion handle allows for comfortable transfer in and out of bed. Includes an organizer pouch to keep items handy, and carrying case to use for travel when collapsed. Installs on any home or hospital bed. Allows for easy transfer in and out of bed.

Collapsible – fits in small spaces, even carry-on suitcases. No-slip grips and safety strap secures rail in-between mattress and bed frame. Universal height accommodates home and hospital bed. Snap together assembly – installs in seconds with no tools required.

The Standers Stable Rail is designed to provide added support and assistance when getting in and out of bed. The height adjustment accommodates home or hospital beds, and the extendable legs provide added stability when standing up. The ergonomic cushion handle allows for easy transfer in and out of bed. Anti-slip grips secure rail in-between mattress and bed frame. name: 30 Inch Safety Bed Rail
categories: Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids@Web Specials/Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.
description: Helps prevent falling out of bed and can be used for assistance to sit up in bed.
extended_description:
The Standers Safety Bed Rail attaches easily to any size home or hospital bed and is reversible, allowing the rail to be placed on either side of the bed. The Safety Bed Rail works as a side rail for preventing falls as well as a support bar for getting out of bed. The collapsible Safety Bed Rail pivots down the side of the bed to help the user get out of bed. Included is a dual safety strap that secures the bed rail to the bed frame.

The easy yet sturdy design allows you install the rail within minutes with only 4 bolts and an Alan wrench. The Safety Bed Rail helps keep loved ones safe and gives caregivers peace of mind.



30 Inch Safety Bed Rail Specifications:

Assembly: Installs in minutes and includes all necessary tools.
Rail Width: 30 inches.
Rail Height: 23 inches high from the base of mattress.
Space Between Rails: 3 inches.
Weight Capacity: 400 lbs.
Weighs: 12 lbs.

name: SuperPole System
description: Secure and safe grab bar to aid in standing.
extended_description:
Health Craft Super Pole System is floor to ceiling grab bar that has a high quality gripping surface that is easy to hold onto. This award winning modular support system is ideal for people with balance issues and for people needing mobility support. This grab bar provides support and balance assistance to those who need extra help transitioning from a seated position to a standing position.

SuperPole is a secure structure that is easy to install and easy to relocate - no drilling, no screws. It can be installed in minutes between a floor and ceiling and is held by a jackscrew expansion. The screw expands the pole to create enough tension between the floor and ceiling to hold the pole securely. Rubber pads on the ceiling plate and the floor plate hold the transfer pole in place and prevent marring of the ceiling or floor. Installs easily with no structural reinforcements needed. Foam hand grip provides a comfortable gripping surface, particularly useful for those with limited hand strength. Installs anywhere there is a floor and ceiling, placing transfer support directly where it is needed. Use it beside a bed, bath, toilet or chair.

Note: The SuperPole™ System should only be installed between floors and ceilings of solid construction or injury may result. The SuperPole System™ should not be installed on loose floor coverings, in rooms with radiant ceiling heating, in mobile homes, or in suspended or angled ceilings. Recommended weight limits are 300lbs. All designs and specifications subject to change without notice. Made in Canada © 2007.

SuperPole Product Information

SuperPole Assembly Instructions

SuperPole System Specifications:

Material: . Heavy duty steel 1.5 inch diameter, 90 inches long.
Finish: Anti-microbial powder coat white gloss finish.
Grip material: Grey, premium high quality grip 20 inches long. Does not contain rubber or latex.
Expansion Mechanism: steel jackscrew, zinc plated 1 1/8 inch fine cut thread.
Base Plate: 5 inch diameter, non marking base plate rubber, ribbed for better gripping.
Maximum Weight Capacity: 300 lbs. (Standard)
Pole length (floor to ceiling): 93-99 inches; 7 feet 9 inches to 8 feet 4 inches.
Standard Pole Weight: 13 lbs. (18lbs w/Hardware)

name: SuperPole System with SuperBar
description: Provides complete support for standing, stepping or transferring.
extended_description:
The Health Craft Super Pole with Super Bar System is a floor-to-ceiling grab bar with a 16 inch horizontal center extension that can pivot in narrow areas such as between bed and wall, narrow hallways, etc. The Super Bar unlocks and pivots freely to move with you step by step. This horizontal security bar locks every 45 degrees for stability during standing and sitting transfers. The SuperBar automatically locks when released preventing forward or lateral falls and provides full support when making two or three step transfers. The SuperBar offers extra help transitioning from a seated position to a standing position.

The SuperPole is a vertical grab bar installed between the floor and ceiling. This award winning modular support system was designed for those requiring assistance with standing, transferring, or moving in bed. Rubber pads on the ceiling plate and the floor plate hold the transfer pole in place and prevent marring of the ceiling or floor. Installs easily with no structural reinforcements needed. Foam hand grip provides a comfortable gripping surface, particularly useful for those with limited hand strength. Installs anywhere there is a floor and ceiling of solid construction, placing transfer support directly where it is needed.

Use the SuperPole with SuperBar attachment beside a bed, bath, toilet or chair. This transfer aid is more compact than a walker and ideal for use in small restricted areas such as washrooms. Useful for pivot transfers in narrow areas such as between bed and wall, narrow hallways, etc. This transfer pole and grab bar allows weight shifting, moving, standing, leaving or getting into bed, or transferring to a wheelchair, walker or bedside commode. In a shower, the Super Pole with Super Bar provides complete support for stepping over the tub wall without reaching for wall bars. The SuperBar can pivot away from shower curtains, allowing them to fully close during a shower. For toilet transfers, the SuperBar permits pulling up to standing and provides leaning support while managing clothing.



Please note: The SuperPole System should only be installed between floors and ceilings of solid construction or injury may result. Should not be installed on loose floor coverings, in rooms with radiant ceiling heating, in mobile homes or in suspended or angled ceilings.

SuperPole Product Information

SuperPole Assembly Instructions

SuperPole System with SuperBar Specifications:

Material: Heavy duty steel 1.5 inch diameter, 90 inches long.
Finish: Anti-microbial powder coat white gloss finish.
Grip material: Grey, premium high quality grip 20 inches long. Does not contain rubber or latex.
Expansion Mechanism: steel jackscrew, zinc plated 1 1/8 inch fine cut thread.
Base Plate: 5 inch diameter, non marking base plate rubber, ribbed for better gripping.
Maximum Weight Capacity: 300 pounds. (Standard)
Pole length (floor to ceiling): 93-99 inches; 7 feet 9 inches to 8 feet 4 inches.
Standard Pole Weight: 13 pounds. (18 pounds with hardware)
SuperBar: Measures 1.5 inch diameter, 16 inch length, locks every 45 degress (8 positions), height adjustable typically 24-38 inches (from floor, with limit of 58 inches from ceiling to top of bar).

name: HealthCraft Smart Rail System Bed Rail
description: The bed rail that swings open!
extended_description:
Unlike fixed bed rails, the Health Craft Smart Rail System Bed Rail unlocks and swings open to provide exceptional support when standing or sitting. For many, getting in and out of bed can be a challenge. The Smart-Rail can help! In the locked position, the Smart-Rail helps with in-bed positioning and is height adjustable to accommodate virtually any mattress thickness. Quickly installs by sliding the low profile frame between the box spring and mattress and securing with the safety strap.

The Health Craft Smart Rail System Bed Rail is a safety bed rail that unlocks and pivots outward to provide better standing support for transferring into and out of bed. This innovative bed rail provides a great solution for those needing moderate help with bed transfers. Unlike many other bed rails, the Smart-Rail™ moves with you to provide dependable support when getting into or out of bed, without stretching or twisting. The Smart Rail System Bed Rail attaches to standard beds, not hospital beds or futons. It is constructed of strong tubular steel and is easily installed by inserting the support frame between the box spring and mattress. The included safety straps secure bed rail. It is simple to unlock by lifting handle. The Smart Rail System Bed Rail support frame measures 32 x 21.25 inches and is rigid tubular steel construction. Traction Grips prevent the Smart-Rail™ from slipping while in use. The height adjustable Support Rail measures 31.5 high x 16.5 inches wide, and 0.875 inch diameter strong tubular steel construction. Grey rubber cane tips prevent slipping and protect floor. The Smart Rail Grip measures 1.25 inch diameter and has a grey deluxe foam grip that does not contain latex.



Note: This safety bed rail is intended for moderate vertical weight bearing on rail only. Do not use if lateral or side ward support is needed. Avoid rail latch unlocking by ensuring that rail is at least 2 inches off floor when rail is in locked position. Soft type box spring beds can compress downward under load allowing support frame to move down, and rail to become unlatched. Do not use on wet or slippery floors. Do not use with electric or hospital style beds. Both supplied straps must be installed for secure operation. Product intended for moderate assist with sitting up and standing only.

Smart Rail System Bed Rail Product Information

Smart Rail System Bed Rail Assembly Instructions

Smart-Rail System Bed Rail Specifications:

  • Important Note: this bed rail will not work on hospital beds or futons.
  • Measurement under the mattress: 23 inches.
  • Top of Rail from floor measures: 30 inches.
  • Support Rail Measurements: 31.5 inches high, 16.5 inches wide, frame 32 x 21.25 inches.
  • Weight Capacity: 250 pounds.
  • Smart-Rail™ Leg Extender also available: Increases rail height range to 31.5 - 34.5 inches. Sold separately.

name: Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions
description: Comfortable, pressure relieving gel wheelchair cushions.
extended_description:
Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions are gel wheelchair cushions with a unique cellular design that provides increased pressure reduction and allows air flow for increased comfort. Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions distribute a point pressure over a wide area thereby reducing the pressure per square inch and decreasing pressure when sitting in a wheelchair.

This proprietary silicone polymer was designed to mimic the same physical characteristics as human fat tissue to reduce pressure, impact and vibration. Medical grade silicone gel won't rot or dry out, will not flow or leak if cut or punctured. Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions are very durable and made in USA. Unlike other gel pads, these gel cushions will not retain heat and are odorless. The gel also remains pliable and soft when in extreme temperatures and is ideal for use in places where the pad might get wet. Cell design enhances cooling and drying, provides pressure reduction, and allows increased air circulation and heat dissipation which increases comfort.

Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions Specifications:

  • Material: medical grade silicone gel.
  • Thickness: 1/2 inch.
  • Available sizes: 14 x 14 inches, 16 x 16 inches, 18 x 18 inches.
  • Made in: USA.

name: GelOvations Gel Armrest Pad
categories: Wheelchair Accessories@Wheelchair Accessories/Wheelchair Positioning Accessories@Featured Products
description: Provides cushioning and protection for elbows and forearms
extended_description:
The GelOvations Gel Armrest Pad provides cushioning and protection for elbows and forearms for wheelchair and scooter users. These arm pads are made of medical grade silicone gel. This shock-absorbing 1.5 inch thick gel armrest pad is ideal for those who want a softer and safer way to rest their arms and prevent elbow pressure sores. A cushioned armrest is perfect for wheelchair, power chair or scooter users to rest their arms on while riding.

The Gel Armrest Pad has a a wooden base and plastic base guard which provides a stabilizing surface for the gel pad. The neoprene nylon cover can be easily washed. The gel pad will not dry, rot or leak if punctured. The gel pad bolts directly to the armrest tubing and hardware is included. Sizes and lengths are available for a desk length armrest or full length armrest. The hardware that is provided for the gel armrest pad is two bolts and washers. Holes in the bottom are universal and designed to fit the majority of standard wheelchair and mobility scooter armrest.

GelOvations Gel Armrest Pad Specifications:

Includes: One armrest cushion.
Weight: 0.75 pounds.
Thickness: 1.5 inches.
Hardware: Included.
Fits: Standard wheelchair and mobility scooter armrest.

name: Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray
description: Provides stable platform while in use and easily flips over and out of the way.
extended_description:
The wheelchair Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray is made of 3/8 inch thick 7-ply natural birch with a wood grain melamine laminate top layer with a clear lacquer finish. The 9 inch long adjustable height bracket mounts on the armrest of the wheelchair. This pre-installed bracket adjusts to different arm rest pad heights, up to 1 1/2 inches high and 2 1/2 inches wide.

When the tray is positioned down, it will clear most wheelchair wheels so the user can self propel without removing the tray. With the tray out of the way, the wheelchair can be positioned at a table.

Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray Instructions

Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray Specifications:

  • Tray measures: 22 1/4 inches long and 13 3/8 inches wide overall.
  • Materials: 3/8 inch thick 7 ply birch with woodgrain melamine laminate top layer.
  • Attachment: Pre-installed adjustable height flip down bracket.
  • Choose: left or right side.

name: Push Bar for Wheelchairs
description: Wheelchair Push Bar
extended_description:
With the Easy Wheelchair Push Bar a wheelchair can be pushed with one hand. The ergonomic design allows the person pushing to place their hands in a variety of positions. When using both hands, the Easy Wheelchair Push Bar transfers power directly to the chair with less effort. This helps to make maneuvering steep ramps, inclines, uneven surfaces, soft ground, or carpets much easier.

Children and the elderly will find that a wheelchair equipped with the Easy Wheelchair Push Bar is much easier to push and control. Very tall people and people with lower back pain will be able to stand straighter when pushing a wheelchair with the Easy Push Bar.

The Easy Wheelchair Push Bar is available in two sizes to fit wheelchairs with handlebars from 12 to 19 inches or 17 to 26 inches apart. The kit consists of 2 L-shaped elbows and an adjustable center bar. The L-shaped elbows attach permanently to the handles of a manual wheelchair. The expandable center bar slips over the upright portion of the L-shaped elbow and is secured with a push pin. The center bar is quickly and easily removed from the L-shaped handles to allow the wheelchair to be stored or transported.

Push Bar for Wheelchairs Specifications:

Includes: 2 L-shaped elbows with attaching bolts and nuts, adjustable
center bar with foam handgrip, foam handgrip for inner tube.
Kit 1 Fits: Wheelchairs with handgrips 12 to 19 inches apart.
Kit 2 Fits: Wheelchairs with handgrips 17 to 26 inches apart.
Made In: USA.
